> "YES"hissed Hydras slighty impatient"All you will come with me"

Iguanus just followed after Hydras, his optics already dim as he
thought about what they would need to accomplish their mission.
Fractyl for his part just swallowed once and then nodded as he too
fell in behind Hydras.

Inferno smiled and bobbed his head up and down eagerly as he fell in
beside Hydras, looking so much like a little soldier, "Where are we
going Sire?" he said, his voice, much like his actions, reader and
eager.

Fractyl blinked as he had never sent Hydras the coordinates. He looked
down at the information he had received and blinked. "Sir." Fractyl
said, his voice low and apologetic, "um the readings we got?" He
glanced down at the listing again and then back up at Hydras, "They
are coming from far north of us, from Pentatron, the mining city."

Iguanus blinked, obviously he had not expected that, "What??" he said
stepping over to Fractyl jerking the pager from him and looking at it
himself. Fractyl stumbled back, obviously upset by Iguanus' actions,
He sent him a hurt and betrayed look but Iguanus paid him little
attention.

Iguanus looked up at Hydras, "Hmph, this can't be good." He handed the
pager over to Hydras for his inspection.

(TAG)

Preston
